1.0.1.name: wordpress/my-twitpics
1.0.1.description:
The My Pictures Widget allows you to show your recently added items to Twitpic.com and Mobypicture.com on your WordPress powered website. This simple widget automatically displays them in your sidebar. If your theme don't support widgets you could add some custom code.

Currently supported services

  • Twitpic
  • Mobypicture

Features

  • Simple
  • Customizable title
  • Only twitter username required
  • You could change the number of photos
  • Link to pictures on/off
  • Change picture size
  • Change margin
  • Border modification
